backend/main.mo: Motoko backend integrating authorization and blob storage, managing user profiles and handling posts, comments, likes, and reporting with permission checks and suspension logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of multiple frontend components, hooks, utilities, and moderation modules.
frontend/docs/production-release-notes.m: Release notes outlining weekly poll enhancements, behavior details, lifecycle states, and publish verification steps.
frontend/docs/publish-to-production.md: Guide explaining how to promote a draft build to production, including checklist, steps, data preservation, and troubleshooting.
frontend/docs/smoke-test-production.md: Production smoke test checklist covering login, profiles, feed, polling, voting, and results validation after deployment.
frontend/docs/smoke-test-results.md: Template for recording production smoke test results with categories, pass/fail statuses, and detailed notes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the app root, metadata, icons, and main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying name, colors, start behavior, and app icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication, actor and profile loading, watchdog timeouts, and routing to primary pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AppErrorBou: React error boundary that captures render errors, logs them, and shows a fallback screen with reset support.
frontend/src/components/auth/AppErrorFal: Displays a detailed error UI with technical diagnostics, reload/logout actions, and boot phase data.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Shows user-friendly bootstrap failure messages with retry/logout options and diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/auth/GlobalAsync: Catches uncaught async errors and unhandled promise rejections and displays the fallback error screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login UI that triggers Internet Identity authentication with loading feedback and branding.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Renders a post’s comments, allowing users to add, like, delete, and report comments with validation and suspension checks.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeleteComme: Confirmation dialog to delete a comment, triggering a delete mutation and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeletePostD: Confirmation dialog for deleting a post, including mutation handling and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a post with actions for liking, reporting, deleting, and toggling comments.
App layout with header, share button, notifications badge, main content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomNav.ts: Bottom navigation bar allowing page switching between feed, create, polls, and profile.
frontend/src/components/polls/WeeklyPoll: Weekly poll UI handling voting, custom responses, validation, and state-based display.
frontend/src/components/profile/Username: Modal for selecting and validating a unique username with server-side mutation.
frontend/src/components/reporting/Report: Modal dialog to report a user account, triggering a mutation and showing success or error toasts.
Dialog for reporting a comment, submitting a mutation, adding a local notification, and closing on success.
Dialog for reporting a post, calling the report mutation and adding a local notification before closing.
frontend/src/constants/uploads.ts: Defines allowed image MIME types and a 5MB maximum upload size.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStatus.ts: Wraps useActor to expose loading, error, and retry status for actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating posts, profiles, usernames, and related data through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuspensionStatus.t: Determines whether the current user is suspended and returns suspension end time if applicable.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Defines a normalized list of disallowed terms and provides utilities to detect them in text using word-boundary regex matching.
frontend/src/moderation/validateTextCont: Validates user text for emptiness and checks for disallowed terms.
frontend/src/moderation/validateUsername: Validates usernames for length, allowed characters, and presence of disallowed terms.
frontend/src/notifications/localNotifica: Manages localStorage-based notifications, including retrieval, creation, marking as read, and unread counts.
frontend/src/notifications/notificationT: Defines notification types and the Notification interface used across the app.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: UI for creating posts with text and optional images, validating content, handling suspensions, and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the main feed of posts with refresh capability and an embedded weekly poll panel.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows local notifications, marking them as read and displaying icons based on notification type.
frontend/src/pages/PollsPage.tsx: Displays the weekly poll panel with explanatory text about the voting schedule.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile info, suspension status, share options, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/polls/extractWeeklyTopics.t: Provides deterministic extraction of trending topics from post and comment text using word frequency analysis.
frontend/src/polls/localPollStore.ts: Manages poll creation, retrieval, storage, and voting in localStorage with weekly reset logic.
frontend/src/polls/pollTimeWindow.ts: Provides date utilities defining weekly poll windows and determining poll state based on local time.
frontend/src/polls/useWeeklyPoll.ts: React hook that initializes weekly polls, filters posts, handles voting, and exposes poll UI state.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitError.ts: Normalizes actor initialization errors into categories like connectivity or authentication.
frontend/src/utils/bootDiagnostics.ts: Tracks boot phases and errors, providing snapshots and summaries for startup debugging.
frontend/src/utils/imageFileValidation.t: Validates uploaded image files for type and size limits.
frontend/src/utils/safeErrorLogging.ts: Logs errors with sensitive data redacted and includes boot diagnostics; formats safe UI error output.
frontend/src/utils/shareHornetHive.ts: Implements sharing via Web Share API with clipboard and legacy fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats timestamps into relative or date-based strings, including suspension end times.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if it exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing existing features, issues, and metadata for a connectivity‑error‑handling fix.
